Text: Oh, Mr. Toad was a television spin-off from the 1990s stop motion animation series "The Wind in the Willows".
Triplets:<Oh Mr Toad
1:
Oh, Mr. Toad: The show was animated by Cosgrove Hall and broadcast on the ITV network.

Triplets: <Oh, Mr. Toad
3:
--------------------
Text: Oh, Mr. Toad:  Despite having a different title, it really differed very little from the previous series, except that every episode focused primarily on Toad, whereas other characters would often have been at the centre of the episodes of "The Wind in the Willows".
